misconfigured.when: required configuration or secrets are missing/invalid for this service

unauthorized.when: internal assertion is missing/expired/invalid, or assertion verification failed

forbidden.when: authenticated but not authorized (e.g., scope/role insufficient, policy denies, tenant mismatch)

rpc_method_not_found.when: route matched but the requested operation is not supported by the gateway

internal_error.when: unexpected error not mapped to a known error type

unsupported_media_type.when: content-type not allowed for endpoints that require JSON

invalid_json.when: request body cannot be parsed as JSON when JSON is required

method_not_allowed.when: method not allowed by this API
